w :  when did you leave for beijing last sunday ?
m :  oh  i planned to take the 8 : 5 0 train .  but the manager phoned me at about 8 : 1 5 and asked me to deal with something urgent .  when i finished it  it was already 9 : 5 0 .
w :  so you had to take the 1 0 : 3 0 train .  right ?
m :  yes .  but when i hurried to the railway station  i was told the train would be delayed for fifteen minutes .

question: when did the man leave for beijing ?
